explains: n. 生物多样性（维持着生态环境平衡的大量各种生物的共存）

sentences.en: Biodiversity was the buzzword of the Rio Earth Summit.
sentences.cn: 生物多样性是里约地球峰会上的时髦用语。

sentences.en: Industry representatives made it clear that their commitment was only to maintain the extent of forests, not their biodiversity.
sentences.cn: 业界代表们申明他们只承诺维持森林的规模而不是其生物多样性。

sentences.en: Biodiversity ensures a resource for new food crops and medicines.
sentences.cn: 生物多样性确保了新的粮食作物和药物的来源。
